data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Belinda works in my office. She ____ a ____ quiet ____. She doesn't say ____ much ____ company ____ or ____ we ____ go ____ together ____ lunch. But when she does talk, she always has something very nice to say.
data.partBlankContent: Belinda works in my office. She i_ a ve__ quiet per___. She doesn't say ve__ much a_ company meet____ or wh__ we a__ go o__ together a_ lunch. But when she does talk, she always has something very nice to say.
data.fullContent: Belinda works in my office. She is a very quiet person. She doesn't say very much at company meetings or when we all go out together at lunch. But when she does talk, she always has something very nice to say.
data.answer: 贝琳达在我的办公室工作。她是个很文静的人。在公司会议上或我们一起出去吃午饭时，她很少说话。但是当她说话的时候，她总是有很好的话要说。
